title: PHPcosh()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPcosh()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Return the hyperbolic cosine of different numbers: "); echo(cosh(-3) . "
"); echo(cosh(0) . "
"); echo(cosh(M_PI) . "
"); echo(cosh(2*M_PI)); ?> Definition and Usage The cosh() function returns the hyperbolic cosine of a number (equivalent to (exp(number) + exp(-number)) / 2). Syntax cosh( number ); Parameter Values Parameter Description number Required. Specifies a number Technical Details Return Value: The hyperbolic cosine of number Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4.1+ ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPcosh()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPcosh()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
